page.title: 15University Farm,Sonning.
page.content: THE FARM IS SEVERAL HUNDRED YEARS OLD. IT NOW HAS{420}ACRES OF LAND.THE FARM HAS{209}COWS WHICH BETWEEN THEM PRODUCE{3500}LITRES OF MILK A DAY. THERE ARE{45}BEEF CATTLE.THE FARM HAS A SHEEP-DOG WHICH BELONGS TO ONE OF THE THREE WORKERS.THIS IS A BIT PECULIAR BECAUSE THERE ARE NO SHEEP! THERE ARE ABOUT{20}CATS WHICH KEEP DOWN THE NUMBERS OF RATS AND MICE. THE FARM IS GROWING CORN FOR THE FIRST TIME BUT IT HAS BEEN GROWING MAIZE FOR SOME TIME.ON THE FARM LAND IS A VEGETABLE RESEARCH LABORATORY.THE FARM HAS AT LEAST{20}IMPLEMENTS TO GO ON A MASSEY FERGUSON TRACTOR.ON ONE DAY,IN 1985,THE FARM PRODUCED{700}TONS OF SILAGE.
